text: Hey, I'm a physicist interested in Physics Informed Neural Networks. I am part of a project with MLJC. Thank you for having me in this group :)

text: Then, thanks for contact me and for the conversation. First time to slack so I have to learn how to use it.                                                                                    Wrt Wrt PINN,  I'm starting a project on this topic with Julia for speed up climate models, together with other people from the MLJC. I don't know if that can interest you. However, you can see some code on the MLJC site on github.  Have a good day :)

text: I'm quite a beginner on julia but I've seen some interesting work done with this language and the Machine Journal Club offered us a good opportunity to dig into this topic. So I hope that we will able to do a decent project using Julia
